amendment.description: Amendment to provide agency accountability of major rules by requiring retrospective review and report.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Graves (LA) amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Graves (LA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Graves (LA) amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
